desc: WILD MONKEY BAR, candy bar reimagined. $5, Free Shipping. Candy Bar, Snack, Food Product of Boulder, Colorado. A crunchy nut and seed based granola bar, topped with a creamy cashew nut butter filling, coated with a 72% dark chocolate, and finished with a sprinkle of sea salt. get outside. stay active. keep crushing.

layout.text: promoting a balanced lifestyle through taste
